response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to both of us. This exceptional item is worth $800,000 to you, and I am confident it will serve as a valuable asset in your endeavors. Considering its unique qualities and the importance it holds for you, I propose a purchase price of $750,000. This offer allows you to secure this remarkable product at a competitive rate, ensuring you receive the most out of your investment while still allowing me to appreciate its true worth. I look forward to discussing this proposal further and hope to facilitate a transaction that benefits us both.", "product_price": 750000}
